Blog.post: urlLink alternet agrees with my 'fuck off' to Adbusters Magazine urlLink Senator Kennedy becomes a terrorist urlLink Here's the tantric sex show everyone missed at my party Today I go back to work at the new place. Oh boy. What fun. I'm in hell and it burns. Old men trying to scam the fuck out of me and beating the hell out of me for a typo. The plus side, is I'll have money for once!
urlLink Jay Cocking. I love you. PORNOGRAPHY IS A COMMUNIST PLOT!

urlLink The Opposition demands recount in Venezuela, gets it, then says a recount will still be inaccurate How hard was it to get one recount for bush? urlLink Will nader tip the election? this fun toy says he will urlLink Will you give John Cameron Mitchell (writer/director of HEDWIG AND THE ANGRY INCH) money to make a new nonpornographic film about sex? urlLink yay...no wait, that sucks urlLink vote here for naked olympics see my previous post.
My girlfriend/significant other NOT MY GIRLFRIEND (ellie, the elephant) Once again, the Amazing Amers Cocking Wows Amers like only he can Stevie need sleepie I can never resist you
You can disguise yourself all you want RYAN ELLIS, but we know, WE KNOW, it's you. (special thanks to livejournal for giving us this insane photo of our cancer patient friend when he had hair)

I just did my first day of training at the track. Imagine a thousand urlLink Henry Chinaskis quietly barking numbers and code like "per" "Tri" while you stare at a keyboard not knowing what you're doing. Kelly (of the rob-dan-kelly) chain was also applying for a job there. I wonder if she went crazy or not. The big question is whether or not I should drive 2 hours for this job or not. Hmm. I have no clue. same thing tomorrow I guess.

urlLink This is sick and makes me want to puke. urlLink Sorry Amers, you have to be 18 or younger for the double double dash tournaments. urlLink half of the blair witch brains team is RIP (poor guy). I can't cook. I feel like a hated housewife most of the time. My best effort isn't good enough. I'm going to stick to writing. This zine should produce some blossoms. I hope the NC likes it and that I can do it in a timely fashion. Maybe I'll start tonight.

my sleep has been on off lately. I'm tired now, but probably not in five minutes. urlLink Bob Mould has a blog ! Those of you who are unfamiliar with the god of post-punk should read it. Smart guy. Kind of dwells on being gay a bit. But hey, who doesn't? For some reason I can get people's friends-only journals on my rss-eater thing (which is good). Only when I'm logged in on livejournal, and I'm their friend. This is good news! I noticed it with Manuel's journal, but couldn't crack my way into other people's journals. Hmmm... Tomorrow, Gardening, eating eggs. Same thing as yesterday. I've been reading so much news aggregated its scary!
urlLink VIVA CHAVEZ Chavez has rightfully defended his title as heavyweight president of venezuela. rock on. urlLink 300 marxists agree

I had to shrink this picture for my blogger icon. I am a sell-out for getting a blogger aren't I? If you don't hear from me again it's because Amers has killed and buried me. Amy took it, I don't know why. but it looks cool. come to ram's horn My name is ryan and I don't know how cars work awww.... our new pet. our new ice cream pet that I ate.
Pareidolia is my new favorite word. It's hot and sexy!
